original_title: All Eyes on Lenzi: The Life and Times of the Italian Exploitation Titan
overview: A look back at the storied career of the late, great exploitation director Umberto Lenzi - as told through the director, in one of his last substantial sit-down interviews, colleagues and critics.
tagline: The life and times of the Italian exploitation titan.
title: All Eyes on Lenzi: The Life and Times of the Italian Exploitation Titan
